entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, North Cape
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:50 AM AST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cape 01:00 AM AST Saturday 18 February 2023
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -9.3°C
Wind: N 47 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets early this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
